Atlanta.One Atlantic Center:
One Atlantic Center, also known as IBM Tower, is a skyscraper located in Midtown Atlanta, Georgia.


== History ==
It is the third-tallest in Atlanta, reaching a height of 820 feet (250 m) with 50 stories of office space with a total building area of 1,187,676 sq.ft. It was completed in 1987 and remained the tallest building in Atlanta until 1992, when it was surpassed by the Bank of America Plaza, which was also built in Midtown.
